game.name: Phantom the Huntress
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Not sword-clanging trash. Not glitter-magic garbage. Bow only. The rest is for peasants. I’m Phantom, elite huntress, eternally exhausted. You’ll track, gather, goblin-slay, babysit dumb NPCs and rank up at snail pace. Wishlist now. I get bonus wine money. Do it or vanish. My patience is dead.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Not sword-clanging trash. Not glitter-magic garbage. Bow only. The rest is for peasants. I’m Phantom, elite huntress, eternally exhausted. You’ll track, gather, goblin-slay, babysit dumb NPCs and rank up at snail pace. Wishlist now. I get bonus wine money. Do it or vanish. My patience is dead.
